verses.content: Uoin hi nuisantu a na, zu hi mi risie a nih, Tukhawm chutaka suksuoltu chu a var naw a nih.
Lal ṭiumna chu sakeibaknei inrûm ri ang a na, Ama suklungsentu chun ama hringna chunga ngei chun thil a suksuol a nih.
Insuolnaa inthawka insietum hi mihriem ta dingin inzâkaina a na, Amiruokchu, invêt taphawthai chu insêl an tih.
Mi thabo chun thlasik leiin hnuoi inlet naw nih a, Chuleiin, busîk pha chun kut dâwng a ta, iengkhawm nei naw nih.
Mihriem lungrila thurâwn hi tui inthûk ang a na, Amiruokchu, hrietthiemna nei mi chun chawi suok a tih.
Mi tamtak chun mâni ṭhatna hril seng an ta, Mi ringum ruok chu tuin am hmu suok thei a ta?
Mi indik a lungril ṭhaa fe mi chu, Ama hnunga a thlahai chu an hamṭha.
Rorêlna lalṭhungphaa lal ṭhung chun, A mithaiin thil ṭha naw po po a hnawt dar.
Tuin am, “Ka lungril chu ka sukthieng a, Ka suolnaa inthawkin kân thieng tah” ti thei a ta?
Bûkna danglamhai, inkhîna danglamhai, Chuhai ve ve chu angkhata LALPA ta dinga tirdakum a nih.
Naupang hmanin a thilthaw- haiin ama le ama ân suklang hlak, A sinthaw chu ân thieng amanih, ân dik amani khawm ni sien.
Hrietna na le, hmuna mit chu, Chuhai ve ve chu LALPA siem an nih.
Zâl hmakhuo ngai naw ta, tlâksamnaah lût rawi i tih, I mithai chu meng la, chuong- chun, beia suktlai nîng i tih.
“A ni nawh, a ni nawh” inchawtu chun a tih a, A fe hmang pha ruok chun a uong hlak.
Rângkachak le lung mantam tamtak a um a, Amiruokchu, hrietna hmûrhai chu lunghlu hlutak an nih.
Hmêlmak mi ta dingin a aiaw dingin a silfên la la, Chun, nuhmei hmêlmak mi ta ding chun ama chu aiawah hrên rawh.
Indik nawna bei hi mihriem ta dingin a thlum a, A hnunga ruok chun a bau chu phaiphinin sip a tih.
Thiltum tinrêng chu thurâwna tungding a na, Ṭhuoina var leh indona chu siem rawh.
Mi bautam invâk vêltu chun thurûkhai a phuong a, Chuleiin, a bau ka lientu chu va pâwl naw rawh.
Tukhawm a nu amanih, a pa amanih ṭawngse inphurtu chu, A khâwnvar chu inthim sâmup- na laia chun her hlum nîng a tih.
A tira chun rochan chu inhmâwtaka chang thei nîng a ta, Amiruokchu, chu tâwpna chu malsâwmpêk ni naw nih.
“Thil ṭha naw chu thung ka tih,” nangin ti naw la, LALPA chu nghâk la, ama chun sandam a ti che.
Bûkna danglamhai chu LALPA ta dingin tirdakum a na, Bûkkhaina indik naw khawm chu a ṭha nawh.
Mihriem fenahai chu LALPA ta a na, Chuong a ni chun, miin iengtin am mâni lampui chu hre thei a ta?
“ân thieng a nih,” hang ti thlâk rawk el hi mihriem ta dingin châng a na, Inkhâmnahai hnunga hrietchiengna siem le hin.
Lal var chun mi khawhlohai chu a hnawt dar a, Bu chîlna tawlailîr kekuol chu an chungah a hung lâk.
Mihriem lungril chu Pathien khâwnvar a na, Phîngsûng hmun inthûktakhai po po chu a zawng suok hlak.
Lunginsietna le thutak hin lal chu a vawngṭha a, A lalṭhungpha khawm chu zângainaa tungding a nih.
Tlangvâlhai ropuina chu an hrâtna hi a na, Mi upahai mawina chu an lu inṭuok hi a nih.
Hliem khawpa vuokna chun thil ṭha naw a sukfai a, Vuoknahai chun phing sûng sûngril hmunhai chu a sukfai.
